name: Nobody's Home
description:
After a night of extreme drinking and partying, you wake up in a stranger's bed to discover... Nobody's Home.


Come for the booze, stay for the...
  • Survival Horror Exploration!
  • After-party clean up!
  • Reanimated party-goers!
  • Whispers in the dark!
  • Hangovers!

Can YOU survive the after-party?

Content Warning: Flashing + Strobing Lights and effects, gore, explicit language, substance abuse, and suggestive themes.

The following is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to actual events, person(s), or places is purely coincidental.
